title: "A temporal hierarchical feedforward model explains both the time and the accuracy of object recognition"
excerpt: "The recognition accuracy and its processing time depend on different stimulus properties such as the viewing conditions, the noise levels, etc. Recognition accuracy can be explained well by different models."
